item.title: Everyday Ethics - Inspired Solutions To Real-Life Dilemmas
item.description: Joshua Halberstam is the king of strawmanning. Every chapter involves him describing these absurd caricatures of human beings and then using them to try to say to something interesting (keyword: try).
